source.c9b6a4d5: def create_download_link(df, title = "Download CSV file", filename = "data.csv"): csv = df.to_csv() b64 = base64.b64encode(csv.encode()) payload = b64.decode() html = '{title}' html = html.format(payload=payload,title=title,filename=filename) return HTML(html)
